data.text: @coccinella2000 Me too. I went from looking like a burn victim to having clear skin. Can't wait to show off to my rheumatologist. 😤

@beastie1200 They hate me because I won't take their meds. I do have things that need monitored, thanks to an old vaccine injury in the 80's. Never recovered from it. Any improvement comes from things I do on my own, medication free.

@dee_latta I don't trust doctors. Every time I deal with them I end up hurting or feeling worse then I did before going. And thanks to doctors I had ended up with the flu, from their fake vaccines on 3 different occasions. I'd rather use effective home remedies then trust genocidal maniacs
@dee_latta Of course.  There is no $$$ in generic OOTC meds.
